name: 123 # Freecell
description:
One of the enormously popular solitaire games, FreeCell is one of a few patience games help you get to sleep. Unlike the other two windows solitaires, FreeCell requires more skills than luck since most FreeCell deals can be solved if you have what it takes!

In this FreeCell game, you can choose game number from 1 to 1,000,000 and continue the challenge on your PC. Otherwise, you will get one randam game to play. Also, you may move cards with a single tap or drag them to their destination. The aim is to move all cards to the foundation piles. Use the free cells and unlimited hint feature at any time.

Only solve FreeCell deals can't meet your demand? Try to climb up to the world GameCenter leaderboard by using fewest moves and shortest time.
